quests.name: A Hint of River
quests.description: Bob wants to get back into fishing, but he's missing some gear. Give him a hand.

questOffer: J'adorais pêcher dans cette rivière autrefois...
Mais il me manque du matériel pour recommencer.
Pourriez-vous m'aider à retrouver l'équipement nécessaire ?
questInProgress: J'ai vraiment hâte de retourner pêcher !
La ligne de pêche devrait être disponible en magasin.
questComplete: Fantastique ! Vous avez trouvé ce qu'il me fallait !
Grâce à vous, je vais pouvoir retourner pêcher !
Voici une canne basique en remerciement !

steps.name: Talk to Bob
steps.description: Meet Bob near the pond south of the village.

validationDialogue: Il me faut une ligne de pêche solide.
Cherchez-en une au magasin du premier village.

steps.name: Get the Fishing Line
steps.description: Buy a spool of fishing line from the shop in the first town.

objectives.description: Obtain a spool of fishing line

steps.name: Bring Back the Line
steps.description: Return to Bob with the fishing line.

objectives.description: Give the fishing line to Bob
validationDialogue: Je sens que je vais faire de belles prises !

quests.name: Test de dialogue
quests.description: Une quête simple pour tester les objectifs talk

questOffer: J'aimerais simplement avoir une petite conversation.
questComplete: C'était très agréable de discuter avec vous !

validationDialogue: Parfait ! Nous avons eu une belle conversation !
J'espère que nous pourrons reparler bientôt.
Voici une petite récompense pour votre temps.

quests.name: A Strange New World
quests.description: Wake up on an unknown beach... Who are you? Where are you? Why is there a duck waving at you?

questOffer: You open your eyes... Is that sand in your shoes?
This isn’t your bed... and is that—wait, is that a Psyduck waving at you?
Let’s see where this weird day goes.
questInProgress: Try not to question why the duck is still here.
Just go with it. Stranger things have happened.
questComplete: Congrats! You survived your first weird day.
Real adventures begin now (with hopefully fewer ducks).
Good luck, Trainer! The world is officially strange.

steps.name: Where Am I?!
steps.description: Wake up, shake off the sand, and look around. Nothing makes sense.

objectives.description: Open your eyes and try to understand what's going on.

steps.name: Follow Your New Quirky Friend
steps.description: He has a headache. He’s also your only friend right now. Let’s trust the duck.

steps.name: Follow the Strange Creature
steps.description: This strange yellow creature seems confused. You don’t know what it is, but it might lead you somewhere.

objectives.description: Looks like the creature went into a lab. Follow closely.

steps.name: Embrace the Weirdness
steps.description: You made it through your first day without running away from talking Pokémon. Or did you?

objectives.description: Finish the opening sequence and accept your fate.
